rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious north-facing entrance with a minimalistic Scandinavian design. Features include a coat closet and open reception area.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Central living space with ample natural light from the north entrance, designed to accommodate social gatherings in a Scandinavian style with clean lines and neutral colors.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater room with soundproof walls and integrated projection system, following a sleek minimalist Scandinavian aesthetic.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern open kitchen with functional layout, incorporating Scandinavian design elements such as light woods and matte finishes, adjacent to the living room for easy entertaining.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A compact guest bedroom with a private en-suite bathroom designed in minimalist style, ensuring privacy while maintaining Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Balcony/Patio
rooms.description: An outdoor space providing ventilation and light, aligned with the north direction to enhance positive energy according to Vastu.

openings.description: Large window ensuring maximum natural light and a scenic view.
Minimalist Scandinavian door design ensuring smooth transition.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached ensuite bathroom, featuring a north-facing window to enhance Vastu alignment and natural light.

rooms.name: Secondary Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring privacy for children or other family members, designed in Scandinavian style with modern furnishings.

rooms.name: Study/Workspace
rooms.description: A dedicated study area integrating Scandinavian minimalist design and functional workspaces, ideal for telecommuting or personal projects.

openings.description: North-facing window to promote Vastu harmony and ample natural light.
Sleek door design for ease of movement between rooms.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: A compact bedroom that adheres to Scandinavian minimalism, ideal as a guest room or extra private space.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Multi-purpose utility area for laundry and storage, integrated seamlessly with the overall design.

openings.description: North-facing window to maintain Vastu and natural lighting.
